Articles.Content:
In VAB, I can set the "min pressure" parameter at 0.75. In flight, I can't only set it to 0.5.

The issue is if I want to read the "Is safe ?", it resets the min pressure parameter from what I've set in the VAB (0.65 in my case) to 0.5, the max posible value in flight

This a a very easy bug to fix.
